ARRALYZE® 推出 CellShepherd®：用于实时监测功能测定的完全自主单细胞平台ARRALYZE® 是 LPKF Laser & Electronics SE 的生命科学部门，自豪地宣布 CellShepherd® 投入商业使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/ARRALYZEc2ae-launches-CellShepherdc2ae-A-完全自主-single-cell-platform-for-real-time-monitoring-of-function-assays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/ARRALYZEc2ae-launches-CellShepherdc2ae-A-完全自主-single-cell-platform-for-real-time-monitoring-of-function-assays.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03bd398a-4af9-43f5-9234-e445a0a10430 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 08:36:00 -0500 ARRALYZE® launches CellShepherd®: A fully autonomous single-cell platform for real-time monitoring of functional assays
研究发现，空军学员的营养知识与重力加速测试的成功有关营养知识、体力和活动以及身体成分与空军学员在重力加速测试（G 测试）期间是否失去意识有何关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Air-Force-cadets-nutrition-knowledge-linked-to-success-in-gravitational-acceleration-test-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Air-Force-cadets-nutrition-knowledge-linked-to-success-in-gravitational-acceleration-test-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=692fcd3a-14e7-4a5a-922c-5ec21dedda24 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 08:02:00 -0500 Air Force cadets' nutrition knowledge linked to success in gravitational acceleration test, study finds
GoFundMe 已成为医疗保健实用程序GoFundMe 最初是一个众筹网站，旨在承销“想法和梦想”，正如 GoFundMe 联合创始人安德鲁·巴勒斯特 (Andrew Ballester) 和布拉德·丹弗斯 (Brad Damphouse) 曾经说过的那样，“为了人生的重要时刻”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/GoFundMe-has-become-a-health-care-utility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/GoFundMe-has-become-a-health-care-utility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bfc4a3c-e673-4522-b04b-ed9dce21f27b Mon, 12 Feb 2024 07:53:36 -0500 GoFundMe has become a health care utility
各州针对健康保险公司的“事先授权”繁文缛节去年，当医生给 Christopher Marks 开了 2 型糖尿病药物 Mounjaro 时，他注意到病情立即有所改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/States-target-health-insurerse28099-e28098prior-authorizatione28099-red-tape.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/States-target-health-insurerse28099-e28098prior-authorizatione28099-red-tape.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=613c6c4d-489c-4fed-bed6-ca7d6e0ab7fe Mon, 12 Feb 2024 07:52:15 -0500 States target health insurers’ ‘prior authorization’ red tape
雄激素受体信号传导可上调驱动男性黑色素瘤严重程度的基因雄激素激活的雄激素受体 (AR) 增加岩藻糖基转移酶 4 (FUT4) 表达的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Androgen-receptor-signaling-found-to-upregulate-gene-driven-melanoma-severity-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Androgen-receptor-signaling-found-to-upregulate-gene-driven-melanoma-severity-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250db690-b614-4cbe-99d9-d0f18a7e2a73 Mon, 12 Feb 2024 07:34:00 -0500 Androgen receptor signaling found to upregulate gene driving melanoma severity in men
孕妇表现出与肠道微生物组相关的显着免疫系统变化肠道微生物群和代谢变化如何与怀孕期间的免疫功能相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Pregnant-women-show-significant-immune-system-changes-linked-to-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240212/Pregnant-women-show-significant-immune-system-changes-linked-to-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ad87f69-a12f-4ad9-8aaa-f2d069b5b29d Mon, 12 Feb 2024 05:53:00 -0500 Pregnant women show significant immune system changes linked to gut microbiome
雌激素产生的遗传学与绝经后妇女患子宫内膜癌的风险有关eBioMedicine 上的一项研究确定了调节绝经后妇女血液雌酮水平的遗传因素，将特定基因位点与子宫内膜癌风险增加联系起来，强调了非卵巢雌激素产生在癌症发展中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Genetics-of-estrogen-product-linked-to-endometrial-cancer-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Genetics-of-estrogen-product-linked-to-endometrial-cancer-risk-in-postmenopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad182b29-73eb-4d49-9614-39be7530f9cc Sun, 11 Feb 2024 23:40:00 -0500 Genetics of estrogen production linked to endometrial cancer risk in postmenopausal women
研究发现压力导致美国青少年滥用药物《发病率和死亡率每周报告》中的一项研究表明，压力和实验是美国青少年吸毒的主要动机，这对制定有针对性的干预措施和教育计划具有重大意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Stress-driven-substance-use-in-American-teens-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Stress-driven-substance-use-in-American-teens-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b3a90ed-dc60-4874-a48f-6a97246e23e2 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 23:11:00 -0500 Stress driving substance use in American teens, study finds
疾病预防控制中心发布新的梅毒检测指南以应对不断上升的病例疾病预防控制中心在《发病率和死亡率每周报告》中的新指南概述了梅毒诊断的全面检测方案，强调结合使用非梅毒螺旋体和梅毒螺旋体检测以改善美国对该疾病的检测和管理https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/CDC-releases-new-syphilis-testing-guidelines-to-combat-rising-cases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/CDC-releases-new-syphilis-testing-guidelines-to-combat-rising-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ea46ecb-d571-4888-8668-b6f34ebe3767 Sun, 11 Feb 2024 22:24:00 -0500 CDC releases new syphilis testing guidelines to combat rising cases
儿童长期感染新冠病毒：仔细观察揭示持久影响《儿科》的一项全面综述强调了 SARS-CoV-2 (PASC) 急性后遗症对儿童的重大影响，揭示了广泛的长期症状，并需要对其患病率、危险因素和机制进行进一步研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Long-COVID-in-children-A-closer-look-reveals- permanent-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240211/Long-COVID-in-children-A-closer-look-reveals- permanent-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a1fe24c-b9f6-4076-8b25-14e19c89b80e Sun, 11 Feb 2024 20:33:00 -0500 Long COVID in children: A closer look reveals lasting impacts
